Html.name: Html0
Html.content: In order to return only permission checked resources (what is an expensive task) we only return this limited number of results. For paging over results please have a look at at the Solr parameters rows and start, e.g., atÂ http://wiki.apache.org/solr/CommonQueryParameters. Since OpenCms version 8.5.x you can increase the resulting documents to a size of your choice.
